item.title: Robinhood: Why Cathie Wood is Betting Big on $HOOD
item.description: Cathie Wood keeps buying Robinhood ($HOOD). It’s a battleground between the innovation of ‘democratizing finance’ and the critical risks of PFOF regulations and an SEC lawsuit. Kurumi sees a next-gen super-app, while Mikael warns of the regulatory sword. See the data and decide for yourself.
